alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 7:25AM PDT until March 29 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 2000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches with higher amounts across the backcountry. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
